summary: Amaia after breaking up with Rafa, falls in love with a Catalonian. Koldo, her father, goes to Sevilla to persuade Rafa to go to Catalonia and take Amaia's heart back.
cast: Dani Rovira|Karra Elejalde|Carmen Machi|Clara Lago|Rosa Maria Sardà|Berto Romero|Belén Cuesta|Alfonso Sánchez|Alberto López|Josep Maria Riera|César Maroto|Esperanza Pedreño|Betsy Túrnez|Alain Hernández|Agustín Jiménez|Javi Chou|María Forqué|Ylenia Baglietto|Manuel Monteagudo|Carmen Frigolet|José Chaves|Sayago Ayuso|Cesc Casanovas|Jordi Llordella|Iolanda Muíños|Ramon Colomina|Txabi Franquesa|Pep Sais|Carolina Ferre|Antonio Resines
title: Ocho apellidos catalanes
